data.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - Bea-Dawe Model Railway
data.detailed_description:
This DLC product requires TRS19.

This British Diesel-era layout includes several stations, goods yards and engine facilities and was inspired by memories of growing up in the Midlands spending many hours standing on the side of the Lickey Bank with Grandad watching the trains go past.

Route Creator: eso

Sessions:

  • Commuter Express
  • Freight Hauler

Content:

  • BR Class 37 Blue
  • BR Class 47 blue
  • BR Class 55 blue TOPS 1976
  • BR Class 105 DMB
  • BR Class 105 DTCL
  • Rolling Stock = 13 vehicles
  • Over 200 additional scenery assets

data.short_description: This British Diesel-era layout includes several stations, goods yards and engine facilities and was inspired by memories of growing up in the Midlands spending many hours standing on the side of the Lickey Bank with Grandad watching the trains go past.
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
